name: Emissions of Air Pollutants
businessDefinition: Air pollutants (Direct Sulphur dioxides (Sox/SO2) emissions, direct nitrogen oxides (NOx/NO2) emissions, direct ammonia (NH3) emissions, direct particulate matter (PM2.5) emissions, direct non-methane volatile organic compounds (NMVOC) emissions, direct total heavy metals (HM) emissions (encompassing cadmium, mercury and lead)
